divs: Sighting DetailsWhile in my backyard I noticed something very large in size temporarily block out the moonlight and cast a shadow across the rooftops of the homes behind me. The large shadow moved in a west to east direction very fast completely blacking out the moonlight on the rooftop areas as it passed. It startled me and I scanned the sky but saw nothing that could cause the phenomenon. I became very nervous and uneasy and went back inside the house.
Summary: Large object moves thru and casts shadows across the rooftops
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
There were no other sightings in Henderson on or around June 25th 2012
